# animate

**Interface Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the map animates as the map region changes to show the items.

## Declaration

```swift
animate?: boolean;
```

## Show item options

- **minimumSpan**: The minimum longitudinal and latitudinal span the map displays.
- **padding**: Spacing that the framework adds around the computed map region when showing items.
- **cameraDistance**: The distance from the center of the map to the camera, when showing the items.
